Title: Blood for Dust
Produced by: Noah Lang Mark Fasano Bernard Kira Arun Kumar Ari Novak
Starring: Scoot McNairy Kit Harington Josh Lucas Stephen Dorff
Production companies:
Gramercy Park Media 
 Nickel City Pictures 
 Witchcraft Motion Picture Company
Release dates:
June2023 ( 2023-06 )  ( Tribeca Film Festival ) 
 April19,2024 ( 2024-04-19 )  (United States)
Production: In May 2022, it was announced that McNairy, Harington and Lucas were cast in the film.
The film was shot in and around Billings, Montana.  Filming wrapped in December 2022.
Release: The film premiered at the Tribeca Film Festival in June 2023.

The film had its European premiere at the Deauville American Film Festival in France on September 3, 2023. The film later had its UK premiere at the Raindance Film Festival where the film was nominated for Best International Film as well as McNairy for the Best Actor Award. It later won Best Feature at the San Diego International Film Festival.
In March 2024, The Avenue acquired the distribution rights to the film, with a release date of April 19, 2024.
Reception: On the review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, 87% of 23 critics' reviews are positive, with an average rating of 6.7/10.

Peter Debruge of Variety gave the film a positive review and wrote, "Bolstered by a strong, poker-faced ensemble with the good sense to underplay whatever menace each brings to the table, Blood for Dust does a fine job of making a familiar gambit feel unpredictable."
Jordan Mintzer of The Hollywood Reporter also gave the film a positive review and wrote, "Well-executed without breaking new ground."
Blood for Dust won the Best Feature award at the 2023 San Diego International Film Festival.
